Operation 'get_/orders' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic ('List orders'). Description lacks detail about parameters, pagination mechanism, and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies pagination support, domain context (forest/paper supply chain), and explicitly mentions the response schema (ListOfOrders with pagination links) to help AI agents understand how to navigate results and what to expect.

data.current_description: Gets a paginated list of all `orders`.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all orders in the forest and paper supply chain. Supports filtering and pagination parameters to control result set size and offset. Returns a ListOfOrders object containing order headers and pagination links for navigation through results.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic ('List orders'). Description lacks detail about parameters, pagination mechanism, and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies pagination support, domain context (forest/paper supply chain), and explicitly mentions the response schema (ListOfOrders with pagination links) to help AI agents understand how to navigate results and what to expect.

message: Operation 'get_/orders/{orderId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too vague ('Get an order'). Description mentions line items but lacks clarity on what constitutes the response structure and parameter requirements. Enhanced version specifies the orderId parameter requirement, clarifies the response structure (Order with OrderHeader and paginated OrderLineItems), and explains pagination support for line items. This helps AI agents understand the exact input needed and what data structure to expect in the response.

data.current_description: Gets the details of a specific `order`, including a paginated list of all its lines.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve order details with line items
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves complete details for a specific order identified by orderId, including all associated order line items with pagination support. Returns the full Order object containing the OrderHeader and a paginated list of OrderLineItems. The orderId parameter is required and must match an existing order in the system.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too vague ('Get an order'). Description mentions line items but lacks clarity on what constitutes the response structure and parameter requirements. Enhanced version specifies the orderId parameter requirement, clarifies the response structure (Order with OrderHeader and paginated OrderLineItems), and explains pagination support for line items. This helps AI agents understand the exact input needed and what data structure to expect in the response.
